title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

  • 1 point - Names a specific RNA virus or type of RNA virus (HIV, flu virus, etc.)

  • 1 point - Deviation from the central dogma

    • (RNA → DNA or RNA → protein or RNA → RNA)

  • 1 points - More detailed explanation of the deviation from the central dogma
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • 1 point - Names a specific RNA virus or type of RNA virus (HIV, flu virus, etc.)

  • 1 point - Deviation from the central dogma

    • (RNA → DNA or RNA → protein or RNA → RNA)

  • 1 points - More detailed explanation of the deviation from the central dogma

Student response earns one of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • 1 point - Names a specific RNA virus or type of RNA virus (HIV, flu virus, etc.)

  • 1 point - Deviation from the central dogma

    • (RNA → DNA or RNA → protein or RNA → RNA)

  • 1 points - More detailed explanation of the deviation from the central dogma

Student response earns two of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • 1 point - Names a specific RNA virus or type of RNA virus (HIV, flu virus, etc.)

  • 1 point - Deviation from the central dogma

    • (RNA → DNA or RNA → protein or RNA → RNA)

  • 1 points - More detailed explanation of the deviation from the central dogma

Student response earns three of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • 1 point - Names a specific RNA virus or type of RNA virus (HIV, flu virus, etc.)

  • 1 point - Deviation from the central dogma

    • (RNA → DNA or RNA → protein or RNA → RNA)

  • 1 points - More detailed explanation of the deviation from the central dogma
